   20: -module(logger_env_var_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("kernel/include/logger.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("kernel/src/logger_internal.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -import(logger_test_lib,[setup/2,log/3,sync_and_read/3]).
   28: 
   29: -define(NO_SASL_PROGRESS_REPORTS, 6).
   30: 
   31: suite() ->
   32:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 60}}].
   33: 
   34: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   35:     Config.
   36: 
   37: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   38:     ok.
   39: 
   40: groups() ->
   41:     [{error_logger,[],[error_logger_tty,
   42:                        error_logger_tty_sasl_compatible,
   43:                        error_logger_false,
   44:                        error_logger_false_progress,
   45:                        error_logger_false_sasl_compatible,
   46:                        error_logger_silent,
   47:                        error_logger_silent_sasl_compatible,
   48:                        error_logger_file]},
   49:      {logger,[],[logger_file,
   50:                  logger_file_sasl_compatible,
   51:                  logger_file_log_progress,
   52:                  logger_file_no_filter,
   53:                  logger_file_no_filter_level,
   54:                  logger_file_formatter,
   55:                  logger_filters,
   56:                  logger_filters_stop,
   57:                  logger_module_level,
   58:                  logger_disk_log,
   59:                  logger_disk_log_formatter,
   60:                  logger_undefined,
   61:                  logger_many_handlers_default_first,
   62:                  logger_many_handlers_default_last,
   63:                  logger_many_handlers_default_last_broken_filter,
   64:                  logger_proxy,
   65:                  logger_metadata
   66:                 ]},
   67:      {bad,[],[bad_error_logger,
   68:               bad_level,
   69:               bad_sasl_compatibility]}].
   70: 
   71: all() ->
   72:     [default,
   73:      default_sasl_compatible,
   74:      sasl_compatible_false,
   75:      sasl_compatible_false_no_progress,
   76:      sasl_compatible,
   77:      all_logger_level,
   78:      {group,bad},
   79:      {group,error_logger},
   80:      {group,logger}
   81:     ].
   82: 
   83: default(Config) ->
   84:     {ok, #{primary := P, handlers := Hs, module_levels := ML}, Peer, _Node} = setup(Config, []),
   85:     notice = maps:get(level,P),
   86:     true = #{} == maps:get(metadata,P),
   87:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
   88:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
   89:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
   90:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
   91:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
   92:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
   93:     [] = ML,
   94:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
   95: 
   96: default_sasl_compatible(Config) ->
   97:     {ok, #{primary := P, handlers := Hs, module_levels := ML}, Peer, _Node} =
   98:         setup(Config, [{logger_sasl_compatible, true}]),
   99:     info = maps:get(level,P),
  100:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  101:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  102:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  103:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  104:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  105:     true = exists(sasl,Hs),
  106:     [] = ML,
  107:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  108: 
  109: error_logger_tty(Config) ->
  110:     {ok, #{primary := P, handlers := Hs, module_levels := ML}, Peer, _Node} =
  111:         setup(Config, [{error_logger, tty}]),
  112:     notice = maps:get(level,P),
  113:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  114:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  115:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  116:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  117:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  118:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  119:     [] = ML,
  120:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  121: 
  122: error_logger_tty_sasl_compatible(Config) ->
  123:     {ok, #{primary := P, handlers := Hs, module_levels := ML}, Peer, _Node} =
  124:         setup(Config,
  125:               [{error_logger,tty},
  126:                {logger_sasl_compatible,true}]),
  127:     info = maps:get(level,P),
  128:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  129:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  130:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  131:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  132:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  133:     true = exists(sasl,Hs),
  134:     [] = ML,
  135:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  136: 
  137: error_logger_false(Config) ->
  138:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs, primary := P, module_levels := ML}, Peer, _Node} =
  139:         setup(Config,
  140:               [{error_logger,false},
  141:                {logger_level,notice}]),
  142:     false = exists(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  143:     #{module:=logger_simple_h} = SimpleC = find(simple,Hs),
  144:     all = maps:get(level,SimpleC),
  145:     notice = maps:get(level,P),
  146:     SimpleFilters = maps:get(filters,SimpleC),
  147:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,SimpleFilters),
  148:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  149:     [] = ML,
  150:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  151: 
  152: error_logger_false_progress(Config) ->
  153:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs, primary := P, module_levels := ML}, Peer, _Node} =
  154:         setup(Config,
  155:               [{error_logger,false},
  156:                {logger_level,notice}]),
  157:     false = exists(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  158:     #{module:=logger_simple_h} = SimpleC = find(simple,Hs),
  159:     all = maps:get(level,SimpleC),
  160:     notice = maps:get(level,P),
  161:     SimpleFilters = maps:get(filters,SimpleC),
  162:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,SimpleFilters),
  163:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  164:     [] = ML,
  165:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  166: 
  167: error_logger_false_sasl_compatible(Config) ->
  168:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs, primary := P, module_levels := ML}, Peer, _Node} =
  169:         setup(Config,
  170:               [{error_logger,false},
  171:                {logger_level,notice},
  172:                {logger_sasl_compatible,true}]),
  173:     false = exists(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  174:     #{module:=logger_simple_h} = SimpleC = find(simple,Hs),
  175:     all = maps:get(level,SimpleC),
  176:     info = maps:get(level,P),
  177:     SimpleFilters = maps:get(filters,SimpleC),
  178:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,SimpleFilters),
  179:     true = exists(sasl,Hs),
  180:     [] = ML,
  181:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  182: 
  183: error_logger_silent(Config) ->
  184:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs}, Peer, _Node} = setup(Config,
  185:         [{error_logger, silent}]),
  186:     false = exists(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  187:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  188:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  189:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  190: 
  191: error_logger_silent_sasl_compatible(Config) ->
  192:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs}, Peer, _Node} = setup(Config,
  193:                                        [{error_logger,silent},
  194:                                         {logger_sasl_compatible,true}]),
  195:     false = exists(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  196:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  197:     true = exists(sasl,Hs),
  198:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  199: 
  200: 
  201: error_logger_file(Config) ->
  202:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  203:     {ok, _, Peer, Node} = setup(Config,
  204:                         [{error_logger,{file,Log}}]),
  205:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  206:                       file,% dest
  207:                       0),% progress in std logger
  208:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  209: 
  210: 
  211: logger_file(Config) ->
  212:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  213:     {ok, #{primary := P, handlers := Hs, module_levels := ML}, Peer, Node}
  214:         = setup(Config,
  215:                 [{logger,
  216:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  217:                     #{config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}}]}]),
  218:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  219:                       file,% dest
  220:                       0),% progress in std logger
  221: 
  222:     notice = maps:get(level,P),
  223:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  224:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  225:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  226:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  227:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  228:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  229:     [] = ML,
  230:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  231: 
  232: logger_file_sasl_compatible(Config) ->
  233:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  234:     {ok, #{primary := P, handlers := Hs, module_levels := ML}, Peer, Node}
  235:         = setup(Config,
  236:                 [{logger_sasl_compatible,true},
  237:                  {logger,
  238:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  239:                     #{config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}}]}]),
  240:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  241:                       file,% dest
  242:                       0),% progress in std logger
  243: 
  244:     info = maps:get(level,P),
  245:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  246:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  247:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  248:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  249:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  250:     true = exists(sasl,Hs),
  251:     [] = ML,
  252:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  253: 
  254: logger_file_log_progress(Config) ->
  255:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  256:     {ok, #{primary := P, handlers := Hs, module_levels := ML}, Peer, Node}
  257:         = setup(Config,
  258:                 [{logger_level,info},
  259:                  {logger,
  260:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  261:                     #{config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}}]}]),
  262:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  263:                       file,% dest
  264:                       6,% progress in std logger
  265:                       info),
  266: 
  267:     info = maps:get(level,P),
  268:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  269:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  270:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  271:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  272:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  273:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  274:     [] = ML,
  275:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  276: 
  277: logger_file_no_filter(Config) ->
  278:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  279:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs}, Peer, Node}
  280:         = setup(Config,
  281:                 [{logger,
  282:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  283:                     #{filter_default=>log,filters=>[],
  284:                       config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}}]}]),
  285:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  286:                       file,% dest
  287:                       6),% progress in std logger
  288: 
  289:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  290:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  291:     [] = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  292:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  293:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  294: 
  295:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  296: 
  297: logger_file_no_filter_level(Config) ->
  298:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  299:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs}, Peer, Node}
  300:         = setup(Config,
  301:                 [{logger,
  302:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  303:                     #{filters=>[],level=>error,
  304:                       config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}}]}]),
  305:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  306:                       file,% dest
  307:                       0,% progress in std logger
  308:                       error),% level
  309: 
  310:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  311:     error = maps:get(level,StdC),
  312:     [] = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  313:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  314:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  315: 
  316:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  317: 
  318: logger_file_formatter(Config) ->
  319:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  320:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs}, Peer, Node}
  321:         = setup(Config,
  322:                 [{logger,
  323:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  324:                     #{filters=>[],
  325:                       formatter=>{logger_formatter,#{}},
  326:                       config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}}]}]),
  327:     check_single_log(Node,Log,
  328:                      file,% dest
  329:                      6),% progress in std logger
  330: 
  331:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  332:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  333:     [] = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  334:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  335:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  336: 
  337:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  338: 
  339: logger_filters(Config) ->
  340:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  341:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs, primary := P}, Peer, Node}
  342:         = setup(Config,
  343:                 [{logger_level,info},
  344:                  {logger,
  345:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  346:                     #{config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}},
  347:                    {filters,log,[{stop_progress,{fun logger_filters:progress/2,stop}}]}
  348:                   ]}]),
  349:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  350:                       file,% dest
  351:                       0,% progress in std logger
  352:                       info),
  353: 
  354:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  355:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  356:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  357:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  358:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  359:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  360:     LoggerFilters = maps:get(filters,P),
  361:     true = lists:keymember(stop_progress,1,LoggerFilters),
  362: 
  363:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  364: 
  365: logger_filters_stop(Config) ->
  366:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  367:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs, primary := P}, Peer, Node}
  368:         = setup(Config,
  369:                 [{logger_level,info},
  370:                  {logger,
  371:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  372:                     #{filters=>[],
  373:                       config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}},
  374:                    {filters,stop,[{log_error,{fun logger_filters:level/2,{log,gt,info}}}]}
  375:                   ]}]),
  376:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  377:                       file,% dest
  378:                       0,% progress in std logger
  379:                       info),
  380: 
  381:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  382:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  383:     [] = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  384:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  385:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  386:     LoggerFilters = maps:get(filters,P),
  387:     true = lists:keymember(log_error,1,LoggerFilters),
  388: 
  389:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  390: 
  391: logger_module_level(Config) ->
  392:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  393:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs, module_levels := ModuleLevels}, Peer, Node}
  394:         = setup(Config,
  395:                 [{logger_level,info},
  396:                  {logger,
  397:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  398:                     #{config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}},
  399:                    {module_level,error,[supervisor]}
  400:                   ]}]),
  401:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  402:                       file,% dest
  403:                       3,% progress in std logger
  404:                       info),
  405: 
  406:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  407:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  408:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  409:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  410:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  411:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  412:     [{supervisor,error}] = ModuleLevels,
  413:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  414: 
  415: logger_disk_log(Config) ->
  416:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  417:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs}, Peer, Node}
  418:         = setup(Config,
  419:                 [{logger,
  420:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_disk_log_h,
  421:                     #{config=>#{file=>Log}}}]}]),
  422:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  423:                       disk_log,% dest
  424:                       0),% progress in std logger
  425: 
  426:     #{module:=logger_disk_log_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  427:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  428:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  429:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  430:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  431:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  432: 
  433:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  434: 
  435: logger_disk_log_formatter(Config) ->
  436:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  437:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs}, Peer, Node}
  438:         = setup(Config,
  439:                 [{logger,
  440:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_disk_log_h,
  441:                     #{filters=>[],
  442:                       formatter=>{logger_formatter,#{}},
  443:                       config=>#{file=>Log}}}]}]),
  444:     check_single_log(Node,Log,
  445:                      disk_log,% dest
  446:                      6),% progress in std logger
  447: 
  448:     #{module:=logger_disk_log_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  449:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  450:     [] = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  451:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  452:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  453: 
  454:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  455: 
  456: logger_undefined(Config) ->
  457:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs, primary := P}, Peer, _Node} =
  458:         setup(Config,[{logger,[{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,undefined}]}]),
  459:     false = exists(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  460:     #{module:=logger_simple_h} = SimpleC = find(simple,Hs),
  461:     all = maps:get(level,SimpleC),
  462:     notice = maps:get(level,P),
  463:     SimpleFilters = maps:get(filters,SimpleC),
  464:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,SimpleFilters),
  465:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  466:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  467: 
  468: 
  469: %% Test that we can add multiple handlers with the default first
  470: logger_many_handlers_default_first(Config) ->
  471:     LogErr = file(Config,logger_many_handlers_default_first_error),
  472:     LogInfo = file(Config,logger_many_handlers_default_first_info),
  473: 
  474:     logger_many_handlers(
  475:       Config,[{logger,
  476:                [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  477:                  #{level=>error,
  478:                    filters=>[],
  479:                    formatter=>{logger_formatter,#{}},
  480:                    config=>#{type=>{file,LogErr}}}
  481:                 },
  482:                 {handler,info,logger_std_h,
  483:                  #{level=>info,
  484:                    filters=>[{level,{fun logger_filters:level/2,{stop,gteq,error}}}],
  485:                    config=>#{type=>{file,LogInfo}}}
  486:                 }
  487:                ]},
  488:               {logger_level,info}], LogErr, LogInfo, ?NO_SASL_PROGRESS_REPORTS).
  489: 
  490: %% Test that we can add multiple handlers with the default last
  491: logger_many_handlers_default_last(Config) ->
  492:     LogErr = file(Config,logger_many_handlers_default_last_error),
  493:     LogInfo = file(Config,logger_many_handlers_default_last_info),
  494:     logger_many_handlers(
  495:       Config,[{logger,
  496:                [{handler,info,logger_std_h,
  497:                  #{level=>info,
  498:                    filters=>[{level,{fun logger_filters:level/2,{stop,gteq,error}}}],
  499:                    config=>#{type=>{file,LogInfo}}}
  500:                 },
  501:                 {handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  502:                  #{level=>error,
  503:                    filters=>[],
  504:                    formatter=>{logger_formatter,#{}},
  505:                    config=>#{type=>{file,LogErr}}}
  506:                 }
  507:                ]},
  508:               {logger_level,info}], LogErr, LogInfo, ?NO_SASL_PROGRESS_REPORTS).
  509: 
  510: %% Check that we can handle that an added logger has a broken filter
  511: %% This used to cause a deadlock.
  512: logger_many_handlers_default_last_broken_filter(Config) ->
  513:     LogErr = file(Config,logger_many_handlers_default_first_broken_filter_error),
  514:     LogInfo = file(Config,logger_many_handlers_default_first_broken_filter_info),
  515: 
  516:     logger_many_handlers(
  517:       Config,[{logger,
  518:                [{handler,info,logger_std_h,
  519:                  #{level=>info,
  520:                    filters=>[{broken,{fun logger_filters:level/2,broken_state}},
  521:                              {level,{fun logger_filters:level/2,{stop,gteq,error}}}],
  522:                    config=>#{type=>{file,LogInfo}}}
  523:                 },
  524:                 {handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  525:                  #{level=>error,
  526:                    filters=>[],
  527:                    formatter=>{logger_formatter,#{}},
  528:                    config=>#{type=>{file,LogErr}}}
  529:                 }
  530:                ]},
  531:               {logger_level,info}], LogErr, LogInfo, ?NO_SASL_PROGRESS_REPORTS).
  532: 
  533: logger_many_handlers(Config, Env, LogErr, LogInfo, NumProgress) ->
  534:     {ok, _, Peer, Node} = setup(Config, Env),
  535:     check_single_log(Node,LogErr,
  536:                      file,% dest
  537:                      0,% progress in std logger
  538:                      error), % level
  539:     ok = rpc:call(Node,logger_std_h,filesync,[info]),
  540:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(LogInfo),
  541:     ct:log("Log content:~n~s",[Bin]),
  542:     match(Bin,<<"info:">>,NumProgress,info,info),
  543:     match(Bin,<<"notice:">>,1,notice,info),
  544:     match(Bin,<<"alert:">>,0,alert,info),
  545: 
  546:     peer:stop(Peer).
  547: 
  548: logger_proxy(Config) ->
  549:     %% assume current node runs with default settings
  550:     DefOpts = logger_olp:get_opts(logger_proxy),
  551:     {ok, _, Peer, Node} = setup(Config,
  552:                         [{logger,[{proxy,#{sync_mode_qlen=>0,
  553:                                            drop_mode_qlen=>2}}]}]),
  554:     Expected = DefOpts#{sync_mode_qlen:=0,
  555:                         drop_mode_qlen:=2},
  556:     Expected = rpc:call(Node,logger_olp,get_opts,[logger_proxy]),
  557:     Expected = rpc:call(Node,logger,get_proxy_config,[]),
  558: 
  559:     peer:stop(Peer).
  560: 
  561: logger_metadata(Config) ->
  562:     {ok,#{ primary := #{ metadata := #{ test := test } } }, Peer, _}
  563:         = setup(Config, [{logger_metadata,#{ test => test }}]),
  564: 
  565:     peer:stop(Peer).
  566: 
  567: sasl_compatible_false(Config) ->
  568:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  569:     {ok, _, Peer, Node} = setup(Config,
  570:                         [{error_logger,{file,Log}},
  571:                          {logger_sasl_compatible,false},
  572:                          {logger_level,info}]), % to get progress
  573:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  574:                       file,% dest
  575:                       6,% progress in std logger
  576:                       info),
  577:     peer:stop(Peer).
  578: 
  579: sasl_compatible_false_no_progress(Config) ->
  580:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  581:     {ok, _, Peer, Node} = setup(Config,
  582:                         [{error_logger,{file,Log}},
  583:                          {logger_sasl_compatible,false}]),
  584:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  585:                       file,% dest
  586:                       0),% progress in std logger
  587:     peer:stop(Peer).
  588: 
  589: sasl_compatible(Config) ->
  590:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  591:     {ok, _, Peer, Node} = setup(Config,
  592:                         [{error_logger,{file,Log}},
  593:                          {sasl_compatible,true}]),
  594:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  595:                       file,% dest
  596:                       0),% progress in std logger
  597:     peer:stop(Peer).
  598: 
  599: all_logger_level(Config) ->
  600:     [all_logger_level(Config,Level) || Level <- [none,
  601:                                                  emergency,
  602:                                                  alert,
  603:                                                  critical,
  604:                                                  error,
  605:                                                  warning,
  606:                                                  notice,
  607:                                                  info,
  608:                                                  debug,
  609:                                                  all]],
  610:     ok.
  611: 
  612: all_logger_level(Config,Level) ->
  613:     {ok, #{primary := #{level := Level}}, Peer, _Node} = setup(Config, [{logger_level, Level}]),
  614:     peer:stop(Peer).
  615: 
  616: bad_error_logger(Config) ->
  617:     error = setup(Config,[{error_logger,baddest}]).
  618: 
  619: bad_level(Config) ->
  620:     error = setup(Config,[{logger_level,badlevel}]).
  621: 
  622: bad_sasl_compatibility(Config) ->
  623:     error = setup(Config,[{logger_sasl_compatible,badcomp}]).
  624: 
  625: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  626: %%% Internal
  627: file(Config,Func) ->
  628:     filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  629:                   lists:concat([Func,".log"])).
  630: 
  631: check_default_log(Node,Log,Dest,NumProgress) ->
  632:     check_default_log(Node,Log,Dest,NumProgress,notice).
  633: check_default_log(Node,Log,Dest,NumProgress,Level) ->
  634: 
  635:     {ok,Bin1,Bin2} = check_log(Node,Log,Dest),
  636: 
  637:     match(Bin1,<<"PROGRESS REPORT">>,NumProgress,info,Level),
  638:     match(Bin1,<<"ALERT REPORT">>,1,alert,Level),
  639:     match(Bin1,<<"INFO REPORT">>,0,notice,Level),
  640:     match(Bin1,<<"DEBUG REPORT">>,0,debug,Level),
  641: 
  642:     match(Bin2,<<"INFO REPORT">>,1,notice,Level),
  643:     match(Bin2,<<"DEBUG REPORT">>,0,debug,Level),
  644:     ok.
  645: 
  646: check_single_log(Node,Log,Dest,NumProgress) ->
  647:     check_single_log(Node,Log,Dest,NumProgress,notice).
  648: check_single_log(Node,Log,Dest,NumProgress,Level) ->
  649: 
  650:     {ok,Bin1,Bin2} = check_log(Node,Log,Dest),
  651: 
  652:     match(Bin1,<<"info:">>,NumProgress,info,Level),
  653:     match(Bin1,<<"alert:">>,1,alert,Level),
  654:     match(Bin1,<<"debug:">>,0,debug,Level),
  655: 
  656:     match(Bin2,<<"info:">>,NumProgress+1,info,Level),
  657:     match(Bin2,<<"debug:">>,0,debug,Level),
  658: 
  659:     ok.
  660: 
  661: check_log(Node,Log,Dest) ->
  662: 
  663:     ok = log(Node,alert,["dummy1"]),
  664:     ok = log(Node,debug,["dummy1"]),
  665: 
  666:     %% Check that there are progress reports (supervisor and
  667:     %% application_controller) and an error report (the call above) in
  668:     %% the log. There should not be any info reports yet.
  669:     {ok,Bin1} = sync_and_read(Node,Dest,Log),
  670:     ct:log("Log content:~n~s",[Bin1]),
  671: 
  672:     %% Then stop sasl and see that the info report from
  673:     %% application_controller is there
  674:     ok = rpc:call(Node,application,stop,[sasl]),
  675:     {ok,Bin2} = sync_and_read(Node,Dest,Log),
  676:     ct:log("Log content:~n~s",[Bin2]),
  677:     {ok,Bin1,Bin2}.
  678: 
  679: match(Bin,Pattern,0,_,_) ->
  680:     nomatch = re:run(Bin,Pattern,[{capture,none}]);
  681: match(Bin,Pattern,N,LogLevel,ConfLevel) ->
  682:     case logger:compare_levels(LogLevel,ConfLevel) of
  683:         lt -> match(Bin,Pattern,0,LogLevel,ConfLevel);
  684:         _ ->
  685:             {match,M} = re:run(Bin,Pattern,[{capture,all},global]),
  686:             N = length(M)
  687:     end.
  688: 
  689: find(Id,Handlers) ->
  690:     case lists:search(fun(#{id:=Id0}) when Id0=:=Id-> true;
  691:                          (_) -> false end,
  692:                       Handlers) of
  693:         {value,Config} ->
  694:             Config;
  695:         false ->
  696:             false
  697:     end.
  698: 
  699: exists(Id,Handlers) ->
  700:     case find(Id,Handlers) of
  701:         false ->
  702:             false;
  703:         _ ->
  704:             true
  705:     end.
